contest-event.event-date:
April 18, 1949 D City of Leicester Brass Band Festival (1st Section)
City of Leicester Brass Band Festival (Championship Section) 10 Test Piece Contest City of Leicester Brass Band Festival city-leicester-brass-band-festival-champ-934
Schubert's Symphony in C [arr. J. A. Greenwood]
De Montfort Hall, Leicester, Leicestershire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £50, 2nd £30, 3rd £20, 4th £10. 22nd annual contest. 11 bands competed.
Nov. 5, 2013, 1:35 p.m. Aug. 10, 2019, 5:28 p.m.
1 Carlton Main Frickley Colliery Band Eric Ball
2 Chapel-en-le-Frith Band Fred Mortimer
3 Cadishead Band Frank V. Lloyd
4 Prescot Cables John Capper
5 Rhyl Silver Band Reg Little
Unknown Result Yorkshire Imperial Brass Band Alfred Whitehead
Unknown Result Rushden Windmill Band William Scholes
Unknown Result Wigston Band Charles Moore
Unknown Result Clayton Aniline Edward Buttress
Unknown Result Finedon Old Prize Band A. G. Remington
Unknown Result City of Gloucester Band George Beckingham
Withdrawn Amington Band Roland Davis
